channel.title: How do i open an downloaded client with linux?
channel.description: Its like this: I have downloaded an client for a server. Now i got different things there, but how do i open / start the client, With linux...?

item.title: How do i open an downloaded client with linux?
item.dc:creator: @holygod holygod
item.description:
@holygod wrote:

[quote=“adamp40, post:2, topic:238762”]#!/bin/sh java -noverify -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server #param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem

SAVE IT AS A .SH file[/quote]

aja.sh: line 2: ./jython.jar: File or directory doesn't exists aja.sh: line 2: ./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar: File or directory doesn't exists

Now what?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 02:22:13 am[/size][hr]Please help. :l

Read full topic
item.source: How do i open an downloaded client with linux?
